title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 6, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 6, 2022
description:
Mark and Gary link up for their first episode of 2022 and discuss the breaking news out of the Maxwell trial where a juror speaking to a media outlet puts the case in extreme peril as well as developments in the Murdaugh case out of South Carolina.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
